description: Borrowed from Japanese 財閥(ざいばつ) (zaibatsu), coined from Middle Chinese 財 (d͡zoj, “wealth”) + 閥 (bjot, “powerful family”). Compare Korean 재벌(財閥) (jaebeol).

entries.meaning: (economics) A Japanese ‘money clique’ or conglomerate; (by extension) in the United States, any large corporation.
